title: 1000th ARAM Win with a Rioter
body:
Soonâ„¢ I hit my 999th ARAM Win and will probably later play for my 1000th. Thus I ask for FeralPony and some Rioters (up to 2 additional slots free), who have some spare time (I know you have some) to join me for that "glorious" event.

Zanryu

replies.body: Welp, I little but late now since I already got it. However we could still play one. Generally I'm always online on EUW when I'm awake.
